title: Opening title of Jean Epstein’s “Finis Terrae” (1929)
content:
Any idea?

author: inktrap

comments.content:
A manually slanted **[Abadi Condensed (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120714/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Monotype%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Abadi%20CondensedPL%20-%20Bold&fid=8ab56184c9d540722a3914bd6b9643a7&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=FINIS%20TERRAE&fit=1)** by Monotype [1992] is quite close.  
An |AE| ligature is also offered, but it's a bit different from your sample.
